verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> sim set פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha thy face עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> har against mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir; Seir וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav. against

וְאָמַ֣רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar-ta And say לּ֗וֹ lo, כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto it Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha I am against הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- Behold O mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir; Seir וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> ve-na-Ti-ti I [am] against thee and I will stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, against וּנְתַתִּ֖יךָ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha against thee and I will make שְׁמָמָ֥ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah desolate וּמְשַׁמָּֽה׃ <S%H4923><s%> u-me-sham-Mah. thee most

עָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei-cha thy cities חָרְבָּ֣ה <S%H2723><s%> cha-re-Bah waste אָשִׂ֔ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim, I will lay וְאַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you שְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah and thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh; will become וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-da'-Ta and thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, Because הֱי֤וֹת <S%H1961><s%> he-Yot have had לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֵיבַ֣ת <S%H342><s%> 'ei-Vat hatred עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, Because thou hast had a perpetual וַתַּגֵּ֥ר <S%H5064><s%> vat-tag-Ger and hast shed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- [the blood of] the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto יְדֵי־ <S%H3027><s%> ye-dei- by the force חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; of the sword בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et in the time אֵידָ֔ם <S%H343><s%> 'ei-Dam, of their calamity בְּעֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et in the time עֲוֹ֥ן <S%H5771><s%> 'a-Von [that their] iniquity קֵֽץ׃ <S%H7093><s%> Ketz. [had] an end

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, GOD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לְדָ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> le-Dam thee unto blood אֶעֶשְׂךָ֖ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'es-Cha I will prepare וְדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> ve-Dam and blood יִרְדֲּפֶ֑ךָ <S%H7291><s%> yir-da-Fe-cha; shall pursue אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- thee sith לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not דָ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> dam blood שָׂנֵ֖אתָ <S%H8130><s%> sa-Ne-ta thou hast not hated וְדָ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> ve-Dam even blood יִרְדֲּפֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7291><s%> yir-da-Fe-cha. shall pursue

וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti Thus will I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> har mount שֵׂעִ֔יר <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir, Seir לְשִֽׁמְמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> le-shim-Mah most וּשְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> u-she-ma-Mah; desolate וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and cut off מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu who עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver from it him that passeth out וָשָֽׁב׃ <S%H7725><s%> va-Shav. and him that returneth

וּמִלֵּאתִ֥י <S%H4390><s%> u-mil-le-Ti And I will fill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָרָ֖יו <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rav his mountains חֲלָלָ֑יו <S%H2491><s%> cha-la-Lav; with his slain גִּבְעוֹתֶ֤יךָ <S%H1389><s%> giv-'o-Tei-cha [men] in thy hills וְגֵאוֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1516><s%> ve-ge-'o-Tei-cha and in thy valleys וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all אֲפִיקֶ֔יךָ <S%H650><s%> 'a-fi-Kei-cha, and in all thy rivers חַלְלֵי־ <S%H2491><s%> chal-lei- that are slain חֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Che-rev with the sword יִפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> yip-pe-Lu shall they fall בָהֶֽם׃ va-Hem.

שִֽׁמְמ֤וֹת <S%H8077><s%> shim-Mot desolations עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam thee perpetual אֶתֶּנְךָ֔ <S%H5414><s%> 'et-ten-Cha, I will make וְעָרֶ֖יךָ <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rei-cha and thy cities לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not; תֵישַׁבְנָה tei-shav-nah כתָשֹׁ֑בְנָה <S%H3427><s%> ta-Shoe-nah; abide קוִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because אֲ֠מָרְךָ <S%H559><s%> 'A-ma-re-cha Because thou hast said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁנֵ֨י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei These two הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim nations וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֧י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei and these two הָאֲרָצ֛וֹת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot countries לִ֥י li תִהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-nah become וִֽירַשְׁנ֑וּהָ <S%H3423><s%> vi-rash-Nu-ha; shall be mine and we will possess וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh it whereas the LORD שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham was there הָיָֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah. become

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> chai- Therefore [as] I live אָ֗נִי <S%H589><s%> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֮ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD וְעָשִׂ֗יתִי <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ti, I will even do כְּאַפְּךָ֙ <S%H639><s%> ke-'ap-pe-Cha according to thine anger וּכְקִנְאָ֣תְךָ֔ <S%H7068><s%> u-che-kin-'A-te-cha, and according to thine envy אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשִׂ֔יתָה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-tah, which thou hast used מִשִּׂנְאָתֶ֖יךָ <S%H8135><s%> mis-sin-'a-Tei-cha out of thy hatred בָּ֑ם Bam; וְנוֹדַ֥עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ve-no-Da'-ti against them and I will make myself known בָ֖ם vam כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which אֶשְׁפְּטֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8199><s%> 'esh-pe-Te-cha. among them when I have judged

וְֽיָדַעְתָּ֮ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-da'-Ta And thou shalt know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי׀ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti [and that] I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נָאָֽצוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H5007><s%> na-'a-tzo-Tei-cha, all thy blasphemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָמַ֛רְתָּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ta which thou hast spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against הָרֵ֥י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֵאמֹ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying; שָׁמֵמָה sha-me-mah כשָׁמֵ֑מוּ <S%H8074><s%> sha-Me-mu; make amazed קלָ֥נוּ <S%H99999><s%> La-nu נִתְּנ֖וּ <S%H5414><s%> nit-te-Nu they are given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah us to consume

וַתַּגְדִּ֤ילוּ <S%H1431><s%> vat-tag-Di-lu ye have boasted עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against בְּפִיכֶ֔ם <S%H6310><s%> be-fi-Chem, Thus with your mouth וְהַעְתַּרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H6280><s%> ve-ha'-tar-Tem against me and have multiplied עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai against דִּבְרֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1697><s%> div-rei-Chem; your words אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I שָׁמָֽעְתִּי׃ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma-'e-ti. against me I have heard ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD כִּשְׂמֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H8055><s%> kis-Mo-ach rejoiceth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, When the whole earth שְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah thee desolate אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-seh- I will make לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

כְּשִׂמְחָ֨תְךָ֜ <S%H8057><s%> ke-sim-Cha-te-cha As thou didst rejoice לְנַחְלַ֧ת <S%H5159><s%> le-nach-Lat at the inheritance בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- it שָׁמֵ֖מָה <S%H8074><s%> sha-Me-mah because it was desolate כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so אֶעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-seh- so will I do לָּ֑ךְ Lach; שְׁמָמָ֨ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah unto thee thou shalt be desolate תִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> har- O mount שֵׂעִיר֙ <S%H8165><s%> se-'Ir Seir וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom and all Idumea כֻּלָּ֔הּ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lah, all וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U [even] all of it and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD פ Peh
